Get in Touch
Don't Be A Stranger Be it a long-awaited reunion or a spontaneous elopement, The Loutrel serves as a gracious Southern host to your finest hour. To start planning your event, please complete and submit our online Request For Proposal, sharing a few details about the event you envision. We’ll be in touch soon to get started. Contact Details First Name * Last Name * Email Address * Phone Number * Company Name * Company Address Event Details Meeting/Event Name * Event Date Start * Event Date Finish * Number of Guestrooms * Number of Attendees Estimated Budget Please tell us more about your visit I have read and agree to the . Privacy Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. Submit

[Page Title: Wedding Venues in Charleston SC | Celebrations | The Loutrel]

SKIP TO CONTENT 
close

Email Sign Up
Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe 
Celebrate Life's Best Moments
Special Event Venues In Charleston With a spectacular location, a sophisticated ambience, and sincere Southern hospitality, The Loutrel acts as a gracious host to life’s most cherished occasions. From birthday and anniversary parties to once-in-a-lifetime gatherings, our gracious Charleston event venues ensure moments that are uniquely unforgettable. Request For Proposal 
Weddings

Elopements
Intimate Weddings and Whether you’re looking for an exquisite rooftop for an intimate wedding ceremony, a perfect setting for a post-wedding brunch, or a romantic hideaway for a surprise elopement, The Loutrel provides an elegant backdrop for every aspect of your special day. 
Accommodations
Wedding Couple 
Named Azalea, Camellia, and Oleander, our three light-filled Corner King Rooms that can be separated with a Lounge King, creating a private two-bedroom retreat ideal for wedding day pampering and primping.

For The Group
Getaways 
Be it a weekend getaway or a family reunion, The Loutrel offers a quintessential Charleston experience that delights at every age, from its central location to an array of complimentary signature experiences, like curated snacks and beverages and bikes for sightseeing.
Request For Proposal

Inspired Events
We're in the Business of When it comes to planning corporate events, our professional staff and business-minded amenities make it easy to focus on the agenda at hand and leave the details to us. With a complimentary daily European breakfast, high-speed Wi-Fi, and one of the only-state-of-the-art fitness studios in downtown, you and your colleagues can show up refreshed and ready to orchestrate your next big idea. Request For Proposal

SKIP TO CONTENT 
close

Email Sign Up
Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe 
Garden-Inspired Lounge
Welcome to our True to the inspiration of Charleston’s celebrated private and public gardens, cherished traditions and the organic beauty of nature are blended at Veranda Lounge to create innovative libations tinged with familiarity. Tucked into the side of our elegant lobby, this is your culinary introduction to the story of Charleston, narrated through thoughtfully curated cocktail and food programs. 
hours OF Operations

SUNDAY - THURSDAY
12:00 PM - 10:00 PM 
FRIDAY - SATURDAY
12:00 PM - 11:00 PM BOOK NOW VIEW MENUS 
Menu

What We're Sipping
Botanical Craft Cocktails Indulge in your favorite cocktail served with a Charleston twist and a bit of fresh perspective by one of our creative cocktail artisans. Read more 
What We're Eating
Delectable Delicacies Craveable, bite-sized, savory flavors live here. From classic spiced nuts to exquisite tarts, discover refined accoutrements to your drink of choice. Read more 
The Study
A Sophisticated Setting 
Gather your closest confidantes for a spirited experience in our private dining room. With room for up to 16 guests, this sophisticated space complements any occasion in The Loutrel’s signature style.

PORCH-INSPIRED
gather at our bar & lounge @VERANDALOUNGECHS

10% Off Your Stay Complimentary Valet Parking ($45/night value) book now Terms & Conditions 
This is a limited time offer available for new reservations booked by March 19, 2026 for travel through March 19, 2026 for stays of 2 or more nights. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included.

Rest, Recharge, & Rejuvenate

Travel Well With The Loutrel
Prioritize your well-being with The Loutrel’s wellness package, designed for deep relaxation and restful sleep. Thoughtful amenities and personalized touches ensure you wake refreshed in Charleston. book now Read More 
Rest, Recharge, & Rejuvenate

Travel Well With The Loutrel

Prioritize your well-being with The Loutrel’s wellness package, designed for deep relaxation and restful sleep. Thoughtful amenities and personalized touches ensure you wake refreshed in Charleston.

Your wellness experience includes:

Custom Pillow Selection – Choose from memory foam, down alternative, or goose feather options

Blissy 100% Mulberry Silk Pillowcase

Lavender Pillow Spray & Loutrel Sleep Mask

Sound Machine with White Noise

Fresh Eucalyptus Shower Enhancement

Personalized Sleep & Wake Preferences – Set your ideal room temperature and wake-up time

Nighttime Snack & In-Room Herbal Tea Service featuring Oliver Pluff blends
*Enhance your stay with an optional Deep End exposure therapy session at Ethos Athletic Club, a guided 45-minute experience combining breathwork and cold immersion to elevate well-being. 
Terms and Conditions
This is a limited-time offer available for new reservations. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third-party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Package must be booked at least two weeks prior to arrival date. Minimum stay of 2 nights required. Additional cost applies for the Ethos Athletic Club's Deep End experience. book now 
Coastal Beach Lounging Experience

Seaside Serenity

Experience a day at Sullivan's Island with our beach package, thoughtfully curated to meet all your seaside needs. Relax and immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of our pristine coastline while we take care of the details for you!
book now Read More 
Coastal Beach Lounging Experience

Seaside Serenity

Experience a day at Sullivan's Island with our beach package, thoughtfully curated to meet all your seaside needs.
Our beach package includes the use of all the essentials for a day of sun-soaked relaxation. 
Two beach chairs

Umbrella

Beach towels

JBL speaker

artisanal sandwiches 
Terms and Conditions
This is a limited time offer available for new reservations only. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. Beach transportation not included; add roundtrip service for $115 through the front desk. Package requires a 2-night minimum stay and must be booked at least one week before arrival. book now 
Blind Date Book Package

Literary Getaway

Embark on a journey of mystery, discovery, and relaxation with this exclusive experience inspired by the allure of "blind date" books. Choose from curated genres like historic fiction, romance, cooking, and culture & art.
Book now Read More 
Blind Date Book Package

Literary Getaway

Embark on a literary journey of mystery, discovery, and relaxation with The Loutrel and Buxton Books.
Choose from curated genres like historic fiction, romance, cooking, and culture & art. 
Package Includes:

A surprise “blind date” book based on your preferred genre

A curated itinerary tailored to the theme of the book, suggesting related spots for exploration

A visit to Buxton Books to explore their extensive collection and perhaps discover your next favorite read

A round of botanical-inspired cocktails at Veranda Lounge

Terms and Conditions

This is a limited-time offer available for new reservations booked for travel through December 31, 2025. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third-party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Package must be booked at least two weeks prior to arrival date. Minimum stay of 2 nights required. Additional costs may apply for suggested items on the itinerary and is not included in the package price.
Book now

Exclusive Romantic Experience

sets us
what Apart 
Centrally Located In The Heart of Historic Charleston

Step out our front doors into the heart of historic Charleston where cherished Colonial mansions, cobblestone streets, and the trendy boutiques of King Street lay at your feet.

All-Inclusive Clubroom
Leave the lobby for a more intimate atmosphere at our exclusive social club on the Mezzanine level, serving complimentary sips and small plates. 
Rooftop Terrace
Welcome to a refreshing vantage point overlooking the city on our expansive Rooftop Terrace, ornamented with verdant greenery and open-air seating. 
Fitness Studio

Set yourself in motion in our modern fitness studio, equipped with everything you need for an active stay in Charleston. From a full range of strength training machines to a Peloton bike—come sweat it out in one of the only state-of-the-art fitness studios in downtown.

Veranda Lounge
Pull up a seat and begin a rapport with our jovial mixologists while they concoct a drink from our signature menu. Tucked into the side of our lobby, Veranda Lounge is a place to see and be seen

To Your Finest Hour
Let us play host Against the backdrop of Charleston’s historic district, hosting sophisticated events comes as second nature to us. Pair an iconic location with one of our four distinct Charleston event spaces and you have the makings of an exquisite affair that captures the true spirit of the city and leaves a lasting impression on your guests. Request For Proposal 
The Highlights
Unforgettable Events 
High-Speed Wi-Fi Throughout The Property

Four Distinct Venue Options

Complete Meeting Packages With Curated Food & Beverage Options

Evening Reception With A Selection Of Food & Drinks

State-Of-The-Art Fitness Studio

Local Off-Site Catering Options

Spaces
Event to Inspire 
Rooftop Terrace
Picturesque Views An unforgettable event deserves an unforgettable view to match. Overlooking Market Street and the colorful facades of the French Quarter, this expansive rooftop terrace offers plenty of open-air seatings in a refreshingly contemporary setting. 
Veranda Lounge
Libations & Small Plates Perfect for private cocktails hours and mixers, Veranda Lounge is a place to see and be seen. Sit around our sit around our bar and dining space then swap stories and share city secrets over can’t-miss libations and small plates. 
The Clubroom
All-Inclusive 
The Loutrel's exclusive Clubroom on the Mezzanne level offers 700 sq. feet of flexible event space.

The Study
Private Dining Gather your closest confidantes for a spirited experience in our private dining room. With room for up to 16 guests, this sophisticated space complements any occasion in The Loutrel’s signature style.
